text: i was 8 and wanted to cheat at warcraft 1. but more seriously, i think i started collecting information from the internet, magazines, etc a little later and realized that there wasn’t a really good way to replicate the index cards and paper outlining and diagramming i did on a computer (which would give me a lot more flexibility)
